assessments.status_rationale: No report that USD/JPY hit 152.00; deadline is still in the future.
August 2025 PPI has not been released yet; no print cited in today’s news.
Performance window has just begun and no definitive XLP vs. XLY outcome is available.
Reports highlight a bond rally after Powell’s speech, but no evidence of a 10Y close at or above 4.45%.
No vendor advisories from the listed companies about the August 2025 Dnsmasq CVE were noted; deadline remains ahead.
While Google shares reportedly rose on Siri/Gemini news, the multi-week relative return vs. Microsoft is unresolved.
No clear evidence yet of Tesla underperforming QQQ by the specified margin over the full period.
